trans-unit.source: Enables the extension of specific behaviors of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 可使控件设计器的特定行为的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time view control object for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取设计器的设计时视图控件对象。

trans-unit.source: The view control object for the designer.
Gets or sets the design-time HTML for the designer's control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置设计器的控件的设计时 HTML。

trans-unit.source: The HTML used at design time to format the control.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时用于设置控件的格式的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: Provides an opportunity to perform processing when the designer enters or exits template mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供了机会时设计器进入或退出模板模式下执行处理。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateModeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnTemplateModeChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。
